When, owing to an inexperienced leader's blundering, the army was surrounded by the enemy in a narrow pass, and there began to be a demand for Epami- ·nondas' careful management to deliver the army from its state of siege, although (cum) he was there only (tantum) in the capacity of a common soldier, he led the army home in safety.
